column4: Hello. Could someone please (try to) help me set up internet connection sharing via wlan from ubuntu to XP? Thank you.. (couldn't find any working tutorial for this online so i ended up here) :)
its called ip masquerading and it is a very advanced networking topic....
is there no program that might do this? I saw something involving Firestarter, but for some reason it doesn't work for me... (says it can't access wlan0)
firestarter is a dead project... you should use ufw or edit iptables directly
